channel.title: Trekking on Clusters and Climate
channel.description: Recent content in Trekking on Clusters and Climate

item.title: Breathtaking Sunrise from the Top of Mt. Sapporo, Hokkaido
item.description: Sapporo Dake trek in Sapporo, Japan, was my first night trek in a foreign country. My friend Tomo, an experienced mountaineer, joined me and knew the mountain well.

item.title: Night Trek to Sapporo Dake, Hokkaido
item.description: Sapporo (札幌) is the vibrant capital of Hokkaido Island (北海道), a paradise for mountain lovers, ocean seekers, and anyone looking to escape the bustle of big cities.
